The goal of my package is to summarize package installment in my R lib

## Installation

You can install the development version of mypackage from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ZhengTianyu2021/RaukR_course")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(mypackage)
## basic example code
```
